org.altbeacon.beacon

Class Beacon.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.altbeacon.beacon.Beacon.Builder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AltBeacon.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    Beacon

    public static class Beacon.Builder
extends Object
    Builder class for Beacon objects. Provides a convenient way to set the various fields of a Beacon

    Example: 

     Beacon beacon = new Beacon.Builder()
         .setId1("2F234454-CF6D-4A0F-ADF2-F4911BA9FFA6")
         .setId2("1")
         .setId3("2")
         .build();
